Title: NFO Tech Walk Through and Conversations
Workday Video Filming: Multiple Presenters in Studio
PEPS Videotaping Info:
PEPS is pleased to assist with videos that are developed and designed to be used specifically for Academic and Instructional purposes. For other needs, such as student group or non-academic events and archival purposes (including recitals and comps), PEPS makes .mp4 Camera Kits available through the Media Check-Out Center.
Video Recording requests must be submitted at least 48 hours prior to the event. Standard turn-around for media delivery is 5 days after the event. If you have questions about your request, please call PEPS at x5002.
